title: We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends
body: It just happened to me just today. I dunno what happedned but it was running perfectly in the morning (i played an ARURF game) now its saying that everytime i open it and it just cant run. Help plz?

replies.body: We applied a fix which seems to have gone well for everyone.  Let us know if this is still an issue for you!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pku9zE8a,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-08-12T23:10:08.604+0000)
>
> We applied a fix which seems to have gone well for everyone.  Let us know if this is still an issue for you!

Still an issue
PC RESTART solved my problem. You should try guys.
same i reinstalled and i installed it didnt work :/
It lets me log in again sometimes but then just makes me restart randomly and stuck in cycle
Same thing happened to me cant even play pls fix
